name: Will-E Tuning
description:
In this Local Multiplayer Space Jacky Tuning Pit Stop Simulator, try to repair your team's racing ship, getting constantly wrecked in the race happening just outside your pit stop. 

Repair broken parts and, if you manage to find the time (or at least if we managed to find the time to put it in), put a nice fresh coat of paint before putting it back on to add some STYLZ to your racing ship. 

But be careful, your workshop is also mysteriously breaking apart (again, cut feature, thanks scope!), don't forget to repair your repair equipment!

Controls: 

  • Left Stick to move
  • A Button to interact
  • B Button to drop item

Technology Notes: 

  • Project Management: Trello
  • Programming tools: Unity 2019.3, Visual Studio 2019
  • 3D Modeling: Blender 2.8
  • Concept Arts & Textures: Photoshop
  • SFX & Music: BFXR, Bosca Ceoil, Audacity, Splice

Credits: 

  • Lucas Tixier: Project Manager & Game Programmer
  • Julien X: Game Programmer
  • Jacques X: 3D Modeler & Game Designer
  • Clément Delamarre: Concept Artist & Texture Artist
  • Guillaume Ambrois: Sound Designer & Game Programmer
